40001017.text:
(Oh, now my body
feels so much lighter!)

40001020.text:
(The Finals will start soon.
Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>arena</>!)

40001021.text:
(Once I leave these doors,
I'll be facing off with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>!)

40001022.text:
(Let's try our best
and put on a great show!)

40001023.text: They're not wary of me now!

40001024.text:
I should go and talk
to their <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>boss</>.

40001025.text:
(I need to take responsibility
for ruining the tournament.)

40001026.text:
I'll follow the road out
and search for the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>encampment</>!

40001028.text:
(I'll follow Aran
out of the arena.)

40001029.text:
Wait fur a moment, meow!
Over here!

40001030.text:
(Soul Bridge Member Baron Dondon
gave me a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Scroll</>.)

40001031.text:
(This is amazing!
I'll use it right away!)

40001033.text:
You can use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>
you just obtained, meow!

40001035.text:
(I'll follow Aran out
and head towards the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Edeta's encampment</>.)

40001038.text:
(I should ask <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Doha</>
what I need to do.)

40001041.text:
(Here's a Baron dressed similarly
to Dondon.)

40001042.text:
(Let's ask if this place
is the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</>.)

40001044.text:
(Let's use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Summon Scroll</>
I received from Dundun!)

40001045.text:
(It feels as if I've gained
something invaluable!)

40001047.text:
(I'll head to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</>
and meet up with the Saho and Aran.)

40001049.text:
(The people next to Aran
must be the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>.)

40001051.text:
(Let's take care of the request and
obtain a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>!)

40001052.text:
(I need to complete their request and
claim the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>.)

40001059.text:
(That must be one of
the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Bridge Herbalists</>.)

40001060.text:
(People with blue skin...
must be the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blueskin</>.)

40001061.text:
Let's head to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>wreckage</>
and save the Barons.

40001062.text:
Ah! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>!
There's a strange scroll
on the ground!

40001063.text:
I think the situation
took a turn for the worse!

40001065.text:
Ah!
You guys were safe all along!

40001066.text:
(Ah, he followed me because
he was worried about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ling Ling</>.)

40001067.text:
I should get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Halfmoon Herb</> near
the wreckage.

40001072.text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Soul Bridge!

40001078.text:
Stealing only <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>food</>
and leaving all the valuables?

40001079.text:
That doesn't sound like
your everyday thief. Let's head towards
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]><textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Carpenter's Quarters</></>!

40001082.text:
(I'd better make the Ratman pay for
stealing other people's things.)

40001085.text:
I don't trust them one bit,
so I'll just take care of them!

40001088.text:
I should head west towards
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lakeside House</>.

40001091.text:
The blood trails lead
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>behind the house</>.

40001093.text: (I'd better get rid of it now and think later!)

40001096.text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Plum Blossom!

40001103.text:
I think I have everything!
Let's head back.

40001107.text:
(Ah! He's running away
all of a sudden.)

40001108.text:
Something is fishy.
Let's go after him.

40001109.text:
The Guards are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>attacking</>
all of a sudden!
Be careful!

40001110.text:
(Whew...
We were able to subdue him.)

40001111.text: I should question the Outpost Captain.

40001112.text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Orders from above</>...
I wonder who they are?

40001113.text:
I should bring this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>order</>
back with me.

40001114.text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Peach Blossom!

40001118.text:
Let's find <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</>.
He should be nearby.

40001120.text:
Steel Fist seems...
to be wrapped up in an unrequited love?

40001121.text:
To each their own.
I'll check on the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cargo House</>!

40001123.text:
Let's ask the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>employee</> over there
and find out what's going on.

40001125.text: I'll just secretly infiltrate the facility.

40001126.text:
Ah, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>employees</> are
talking about something.

40001127.text:
I'll creep up behind them
and listen in.

40001129.text:
Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>location</>
the employees were talking about!

40001130.text:
I should take care of those
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mercenaries</> first.

40001132.text:
There's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>letter</>?
What did it say?

40001134.text:
You're not exactly honest,
are you? Haha.

40001135.text:
I've obtained the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>
from the Soul Steel!

40001137.text:
(Ah! A <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>strange rat</>
is beckoning me forward.)

40001138.text: They did say they don't mind how I got it.

40001139.text:
If I've got the coins,
buying these could be an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>option</>!

40001140.text:
They are so expensive,
but that saved me some time!

40001146.text:
(All right, let's go meet up
with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>.)

40001147.text:
(I'll tell Harum I've collected
all the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plaque of Merit</>!)

40001148.text:
(What's going on?
I should follow them.)

40001150.text:
(Let's talk with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>
about what we'll do.)

40001151.text:
(Aran is going to look
for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>.)

40001152.text:
(What <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>request</> is Orum going to
ask me to do?)

40001153.text:
(There's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>merchant</> that
deals in Plaques of Merit.)

40001159.text:
(I feel as though
I might be sucked in.)

40001164.text:
(I feel like I could use
a new <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Windwalk</>.)

40001170.text:
(This must be the place
that Aran mentioned!)

40001171.text:
(The cute little Barons are setting up
their <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>campsite</>!)

40001174.text:
(Where did they come from?
I was really surprised.)

40001175.text:
(I'll check if this shiny object
is indeed <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>.)

40001176.text:
(I should ask if
other <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelites</>
are useless.)

40001177.text:
Haha, not really.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</> is generally
very expensive.

40001178.text:
That's why a lot of
people hunt for them
in the first place.

40001179.text:
And you might already
know this, but in the case of
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>,

40001180.text:
they absorb the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>power</>
of the Caelite, thereby
extending their power and life.

40001181.text:
However, they are
unable to absorb
the<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite itself</>.

40001182.text:
That's why they usually try to wait for
someone to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>unseal</> it
and then ambush them.

40001183.text:
I want to
hear some more.

40001184.text:
My story must have been
very amusing! Haha.

40001185.text:
But for now, let's finish
investigating this area first.

40001187.text:
(I'll take a look
at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>top of the cliff</>!)

40001192.text:
(I never knew that
I could absorb Caelite.)

40001197.text:
(I should ask that person
about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollow</>!)

40001200.text:
(It seems I can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>donate money</>
and purchase it.)

40001203.text:
(It seems the core will come
if I hunt a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollow</>.)

40001205.text:
(It seems I can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>donate money</>
and purchase it.)

40001207.text:
(I can see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>.
I should relay the fruits of my labor.)

40001209.text:
(I'll head to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Deep Forest Graveyard</>
that Harum mentioned.)

40001210.text:
(I should deal with these entities
that disrupt the forest.)

40001216.text:
(A mysterious device has appeared
on <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>both sides of the room</>!)

40001218.text:
(Ah, there stands Edeta member Doha,
whom I met at the Pub.)

40001220.text:
Excuse me, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.
There's something else I have to tell you.

40001222.text:
(Finally, I've got Hongrin's Core!
I should go back to Moonwater Harbor through Windstride.)

40001223.text:
Hey, wait!
I want to talk to you!

40001224.text:
(The Sapphire Basin residents
have prepared a gift to cheer up
the finalists!)

40001225.text:
(We'll get there faster
if we windstride
to the Barren Ruins!)

40001226.text:
The medicine will lose effect, you idiot!
Go straight to the arena!

40001228.text:
I'm sorry for being late!
What's all this?

40001230.text:
What are you all waiting for!?
Kill him!

40001231.text:
Ugh... My body...
Something's horribly wrong!

40001232.text:
(What in the world
is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Makara</> up to?)

40001233.text:
You! You there!
Come here immediately!

40001235.text:
(Fish thieves also
I think they stole the cargo)

40001236.text:
(Let's retrieve the cargo that the crab thieves
taken
 too!)
